tag_list: ed-english, product-management, smart-glasses, augmented-reality, microsoft, sharepoint
overview:
Ed English is the Vice President and General Manager of APX Labs, a company that created a completely new way of interacting with the world through a heads-up, hands-free, see-through, real-time, in-context system. APX builds the software that brings Smart Glasses to life.

Previously, he was Director of Product Management for the SharePoint business at Microsoft. He was instrumental over the course of six years and three product releases to turn a relatively small product (by Microsoft standards) into a market leading $2B juggernaut.

Prior, Ed was at REDF, leading analtyic-driven, direct marketing campaigns for Fortune 500 clients. And before that he was also VP Corporate Development at netVMG, a company building network routing software.

Ed started his career at Deloitte where he specialized in marketing strategy, new market entry and private equity due diligence and served over 20 clients in 10 countries
